anagathaya wenuwen yami aayojanayak sidukirimata sudasu kalayaki.rauki raksha adiyehi katayuthu wyaparika katayuthu kerehi thama awadhanaya nisi lesa yomu kirima yahapathi.thirana ganiemidi nisi lesa soya balima yahapathi.aadayami himi wima menma yami yami aakaraye mudal waya wimida yediya hakiyi.depola miladi ganimi laniwasa idikirimi aadiya sa`dahada kalaya suduyi.samahara wita depola himi wimakda balaporoththu wiya hakiyi.wiwaha sahakaru ho pawule katayuthu wenuwen yami wehesak ho waya wimak athiwiya hakiyi.

wruththiya samithi wala parajika wima elidaraw karamin kamkaruwan sandaha wikalpa sanwidhana wala awashyathawa awadharanaya kala samajawadi samanatha pakshaye (sasapa) aragalaya thuladi maskeliya disayid waththe kamkaru kandayamak sasapa samaga ekwa kriyakari kamituwak goda nagimata mulikathwaya ganima kamkaru panthiya thula samithi kerehi wardhanaya wana mema wiruddhathwaye pahadili pa්rakashanayaki.
